title: Infinite dimensional Teichmüller spaces
abstract: The article under review is a concise but contemporary survey of infinite-dimensional Teichmüller spaces. In particular, it contains recent remarkable results by the authors on this subject.
referencetext:
[1] L. Bers, Automorphic forms and Poincar´e series for finitely generated Fuchsian
groups, Amer. Math. J., 87 (1965), 196–214.
[2] C. Earle and F. Gardiner, Geometric isomorphisms between infinite dimensional
Teichm¨uller spaces, Trans. Amer. Math. Soc., 348, no. 3 (1996), 1163–1190.
[3] C. Earle and I. Kra, On holomorphic mappings between Teichm¨uller spaces,
Contributions to Analysis, Academic Press, New York (1974), 107–124.
[4] C. Earle, I. Kra and S. Krushkal, Holomorphic motions and Teichm¨uller spaces,
Trans. Amer. Math. Soc., 343, no.2 (1994), 927–948.
[5] C. Earle and V. Markovic, Isometries between the spaces of L1 holomorphic
quadratic differentials on Riemann surfaces of finite type, Duke Math. J., 120,
no.2 (2003), 433–440.
[6] A. Fletcher, Local Rigidity of Infinite Dimensional Teichm¨uller Spaces, J. London
Math. Soc., 74 (1) (2006), 26–40.
[7] A. Fletcher and V. Markovic, Quasiconformal mappings and Teichm¨uller theory,
OUP (2007).
[8] F. Gardiner, Teichm¨uller Theory and Quadratic Differentials, John Wiley and
Sons (1987).
[9] I. Kra, Automorphic forms and Kleinian groups, Benjamin, Reading, Massachusetts
(1972).
[10] I. Kra, The carath´eodory metric on abelian Teichm¨uller disks, J. Analyse Math.,
40 (1981), 129–143
[11] S. Krushkal, Grunsky coefficient inequalities, Carath´eodory metric and extremal
quasiconformal mappings, Comment. Math. Helv., 64, no. 4 (1989), 650–660.
[12] N. Lakic, An isometry theorem for quadratic differentials on Riemann surfaces
of finite genus, Trans. Amer. Math. Soc., 349, no.7 (1997), 2951-2967.
[13] K. Matsuzaki, Inclusion relations between the Bers embeddings of Teichm¨uller
spaces, Israel J. Math., 140 (2004), 113–123.
[14] V. Markovic, Biholomorphic maps between Teichm¨uller spaces, Duke Math. J.,
120, no. 2 (2003), 405–431.
[15] A. Pelczynski, Projections in certain Banach spaces, Studia. Math., 19 (1960),
209–228.
[16] H. Royden, Automorphisms and isometries of Teichm¨uller space in ’Advances
of the Theory of Riemann Surfaces,’ Ann. Math. Stud., 66 (1971), 369–384.
[17] W. Rudin, Lp-isometries and equimeasurability, Indiana Univ. Math. J., 25,
no. 3 (1976) 215–228.
